statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{11.00}; top has length \displaystyle{14.08}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{10.38} and \displaystyle{11.63}. The height is \displaystyle{9.96}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{14.08}+{11.63}+{11.00}+{10.38}={47.09}.
